languages.text: "Ежели человек носит в своей голове слишком много грязных секретов, что удивительного, что в грязи заведутся паразиты и изъязвят мысли".
"If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."
languages.original_text: "Ежели человек носит в своей голове слишком много грязных секретов, что удивительного, что в грязи заведутся паразиты и изъязвят мысли".

traits.locale_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “如果一个人脑子里有太多肮脏的秘密，这些肮脏的东西就会自然而然地滋生出寄生虫，继而毒害那个人的思想。”
languages.original_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."

traits.locale_text: “如果一个人脑子里有太多肮脏的秘密，这些肮脏的东西就会自然而然地滋生出寄生虫，继而毒害那个人的思想。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Quand on garde une bouillasse de secrets plus crasseux les uns que les autres, il ne faut pas s'étonner que des parasites viennent vous empoisonner l'esprit. »
languages.original_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."

traits.locale_text: « Quand on garde une bouillasse de secrets plus crasseux les uns que les autres, il ne faut pas s'étonner que des parasites viennent vous empoisonner l'esprit. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Si un hombre guarda demasiados secretos mugrientos en su cabeza, no debería sorprenderle que la mugre aloje parásitos y envenene sus pensamientos».
languages.original_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."

traits.locale_text: «Si un hombre guarda demasiados secretos mugrientos en su cabeza, no debería sorprenderle que la mugre aloje parásitos y envenene sus pensamientos».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「意外なことじゃない。頭の中に秘密を抱えすぎれば、汚れが寄生虫の隠れ家になり、思考は毒されるもんだ」
languages.original_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."

traits.locale_text: 「意外なことじゃない。頭の中に秘密を抱えすぎれば、汚れが寄生虫の隠れ家になり、思考は毒されるもんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Trägt ein Mann zu viele schmutzige Geheimnisse in seinem Kopf mit sich herum, so ist es wenig überraschend, wenn in dem Dreck Parasiten hausen und seine Gedanken vergiften."
languages.original_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."

traits.locale_text: "Trägt ein Mann zu viele schmutzige Geheimnisse in seinem Kopf mit sich herum, so ist es wenig überraschend, wenn in dem Dreck Parasiten hausen und seine Gedanken vergiften."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."

languages.text: "Bir kişi beyninde çok fazla kirli sır taşıyorsa oraya yığılan parazitlerin zihnini zehirlemesine şaşmamak gerekir."
languages.original_text: "If a man carries too many grubby secrets around in his head, it will come as no surprise if the muck harbours parasites and poisons his thoughts."

traits.locale_text: "Bir kişi beyninde çok fazla kirli sır taşıyorsa o pisliğin içindeki parazitlerin zihnini zehirlemesi şaşırtıcı değildir."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
